comment.author: 77345821@N06
comment._content:
This fellow is in a German uniform. Why would Robert Todd, a US ace, be wearing a German uniform? I think this photo is misidentified. Robert "Bob" Todd flew with the 17th Aero Squadron and was a prisoner of the Germans. This doesn't look llike him... 

What is the source?

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
